1173300.name: King of Halloween OST and Artbook
1173300.description:
Did you enjoy the wide variety of catchy tunes on King of Halloween? The tour de force of music that went everywhere from smooth jazz to reggae to a son Cubano can be yours now!

Composed by legendary jazz pianist, producer and composer Lorenzo “Hands” Vermonti; this CD is definitely an excellent addition to your library.

Re-live the political madness and hilarity featured in King of Halloween by purchasing this CD now!

Track List:

01 – The City Boss
02 – Getting Down to Business
03 – Daiquiris in City Hall
04 – Dreadlocks and Warlocks
05 – Reviewing Results
06 – Selma’s Theme
07 – Midnight Treat
08 – The Cauldron Bar
1173300.supported_languages: 英语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文
